duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer and support Web Center 11.1.x and 12.x systems for invoice processing automation and quality content/document management.
Utilize IT Service Management (ITSM) processes and tools for managing service requests, incidents, problems, and changes.
Identify and pursue opportunities to improve the Web Center system in terms of business process efficiency and system reliability, usability, and performance.
Deploy changes across the Web Center landscape (development, QA/test, and production).
Lead projects, solutions, and/or processes of medium to high complexity, including requirements definition and internal/external resource management.
Collaborate across functional, company, and geographical boundaries.
Provide mentoring and coaching to junior team members.
Proactively enforce worldwide and local security policies to ensure IT information assets are protected.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT or related field (Master's preferred)
